text:
March 5, 1951
Mr* Charter Hesiep, Chief
Radio-Television Branch
Atomic Energy Commission
Washington 25, D* C.
Dear Mr* Hesiep:
My sincerest thanks for all of the trouble you have taken
in acquiring the WLS series*
I have contacted WLS and we are getting the series ready for
issue to our stations. I will take an inventory of our member
stations and send a complete list of those that will carry the
programs to AFRA headquarters# I gather from their letter that
they will then give us clearances. Naturally, I will do this
before the programs are sent out*
I am also writing Mrs. Broderick so that she will know
exactly what we are doing.
Again on behalf of NAEB, my thanks. Â¥ith warmest regards,
Cordially yours,
Richard L. Rider
Manager
NAEB Tape Network
RLRibgm
